publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2739# Pauline McNeill: Glasgow City Council and Free Breakfasts-That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City Council for rolling out its free daily breakfasts to every pupil at primary schools in the city; notes that the pilot project starting in 20 Glasgow primary schools in February 2002 will provide children with a choice of toast and cereals with milk, fruit juice or water and that yoghurt, raisins and fresh fruit will also be piloted; further notes that the free breakfast plan complements the Council's other initiatives of free fruit three days a week to all 60,000 primary and nursery children and free swimming at Council pools for all children under the age of 18, and believes that these initiatives will go a long way to improving the diet and health of children in Glasgow as well as providing improved chances for better learning.
S1M-2739# Glasgow City Council and Free Breakfasts (lodged on 12 February 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
